message: The FDA is aware of emerging supply challenges in the market and is actively monitoring the situation. We encourage manufacturers and stakeholders to report any disruptions and collaborate to ensure continued supply.
decision_context: {'shortage_assessment': 'The shortage is emerging with insufficient supply and some market disruption, but not yet critical. Coordination could be beneficial.', 'intervention_justification': 'A monitoring statement is appropriate to acknowledge the situation without causing panic or exacerbating the shortage.', 'market_impact_prediction': 'Manufacturers may increase reporting and coordination efforts, while buyers are less likely to engage in panic buying due to the non-alarmist tone.', 'patient_safety_considerations': 'Current patient safety risk is low, and access concerns are manageable at this stage.'}

message: The FDA is aware of an emerging drug shortage and encourages manufacturers to report any supply disruptions. We are working with stakeholders to coordinate efforts to mitigate the impact.
decision_context: {'shortage_assessment': 'The shortage is emerging with insufficient supply and early signs of market coordination problems.', 'intervention_justification': 'An alert is appropriate to facilitate industry coordination without causing panic buying. Early communication has been beneficial in similar past cases.', 'market_impact_prediction': 'Manufacturers may be encouraged to increase capacity, and buyers will be informed, reducing the likelihood of panic buying.', 'patient_safety_considerations': 'Moderate patient safety risk necessitates timely communication to ensure access and mitigate clinical impacts.'}

message: The FDA is aware of an emerging shortage in the market. We encourage manufacturers to report any disruptions and coordinate with the FDA to address supply issues. Stakeholders are advised to manage inventory responsibly.
decision_context: {'shortage_assessment': 'The shortage is emerging with insufficient supply and disrupted market stability. Coordination is needed to prevent escalation.', 'intervention_justification': 'An alert is appropriate to facilitate industry coordination without causing panic. It aligns with precedent guidance for similar cases.', 'market_impact_prediction': 'Manufacturers are likely to increase production capacity, while buyers may stabilize purchasing behavior with responsible inventory management.', 'patient_safety_considerations': 'The patient safety risk is low to moderate, and early communication can help ensure continued access to necessary medications.'}
